typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> TCrossReference
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> TCrossReference1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> StaSeniorClaimHandler
source(output(
		EMPLOYEE_ID as string,
		COMPANY as string,
		COMPANY_NAME as string,
		MAIN_EMPLOYER as decimal(38,18),
		CONTRACT_TYPE as string,
		CONTRACT_DESC as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		AD_NAME as string,
		JOBPHONE as string,
		SHORTPHONE as string,
		JOBMOBILE as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		COSTC as string,
		LAST_UPDATE as timestamp,
		POSITION as string,
		POSITION_TITLE as string,
		SENIORITY as string,
		SEN_TITLE as string,
		DISPLAY_NAME as string,
		OFFICE as string,
		STATUS as string,
		STATUS_DESC as string,
		CONTR_DATE_FROM as timestamp,
		CONTR_DATE_TO as timestamp,
		GARD_NO as decimal(38,18),
		THE_BRIDGE as decimal(38,18),
		P_GARD_NO as decimal(38,18),
		P_THE_BRIDGE as decimal(38,18),
		NICKNAME as string,
		COSTC_STATUS as string,
		P_MYGARD_FX as decimal(38,18)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> UdvEmployee
TCrossReference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID == 329) ~> FilterEmployee
TCrossReference1 filter(CODE_TYPE_ID == 329) ~> Filter0Employee
SelectOnlyTargets aggregate(groupBy(TARGET_CODE,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION),
	each(match(!in(['TARGET_CODE','TARGET_DESCRIPTION'],name)), $$ = first($$))) ~> Deduplicator
FilterEmployee select(mapColumn(
		TARGET_CODE,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOnlyTargets
SelectSourceAndTargets, ConvertToString join(SOURCE_CODE_KEY == toString(EMP_ID),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinerStaSeniorClaimANDCross
StaSeniorClaimHandler derive(EMP_ID = 109,
		EFFECTIVE_FROM_DATE = fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'CET'),
		EXPIRATION_TO_DATE = fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'CET')) ~> ConvertToString
Filter0Employee select(mapColumn(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
		TARGET_CODE,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSourceAndTargets
JoinerStaSeniorClaimANDCross select(mapColumn(
		TARGET_CODE,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		EFFECTIVE_FROM_DATE,
		EXPIRATION_TO_DATE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectFromJoinerCrossSta
Deduplicator, SelectFromJoinerCrossSta join(Deduplicator@TARGET_CODE == SelectFromJoinerCrossSta@TARGET_CODE,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinerDeduplicatorANDJoinerStaSeniorClaim
JoinerDeduplicatorANDJoinerStaSeniorClaim derive(TARGET_DESCRIPTION = substring('Deduplicator@TARGET_DESCRIPTION', 1, 40)) ~> Expression
Expression select(mapColumn(
		TARGET_CODE = Deduplicator@TARGET_CODE,
		EMPL_NAME = Deduplicator@TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		EFFECTIVE_FROM_DATE,
		EXPIRATION_TO_DATE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectBeforeDeduplicator
SelectBeforeDeduplicator aggregate(groupBy(TARGET_CODE,
		EFFECTIVE_FROM_DATE,
		{} = ERROR_FUNCTION(''))) ~> Aggregate1
